definition: safe and sound/well/without mishap/quiet and safe/at peace
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
to have a pleasant journey/Bon voyage!
Ping'an county in Haidong prefecture 海東地區|海东地区[Hai3 dong1 di4 qu1], Qinghai
South P'yong'an Province in west of North Korea
P'yong'ando Province of Joseon Korea, now divided into South Pyong'an Province 平安南道[Ping2 an1 nan2 dao4] and North Pyong'an Province 平安北道[Ping2 an1 bei3 dao4] of North Korea
lit. peace when you come or go/peace wherever you go
North P'yong'an Province in west of North Korea, adjacent to Liaoning
Heian period (794-1185), period of Japanese history
Heian Jingū or Heian Shrine, in Kyōto, Japan
May you have peace year after year (New Year's greeting)
fish brings heat, meat brings phlegm, vegetables and tofu keep you healthy
pinyin: yu2 sheng1 huo3 , rou4 sheng1 tan2 , qing1 cai4 dou4 fu5 bao3 ping2 an1
containing_words.word: 鱼生火，肉生痰，青菜豆腐保平安

sentences.english: Linda phoned me in on arrival so that I know she was safe and sound.
sentences.chinese: 琳达到达后给我打了电话，因而我知道她平安无事。

sentences.english: Securely held by a lobster clasp closure, the pendant also comes with an extender chain.
sentences.chinese: 龙虾搭扣平安保险方便，并配有加长配饰。

sentences.english: He slaughtered the ox and the ram as the fellowship offering for the people.
sentences.chinese: 亚伦宰了那给百姓作平安祭的公牛和公绵羊。

sentences.english: You should send a message to your family, maybe they are looking forward to it!
sentences.chinese: 给您的家人报一声平安，或许他们正在翘首企盼。

sentences.english: No lives were lost, and we could wade ashore in safety.
sentences.chinese: 人都安然无恙，我们都能平安地涉水上岸。
那一夜平安无事地过去了。

sentences.english: There we can rest at peace forever!
sentences.chinese: 在那里我们将永远安息在平安里。

sentences.english: "I want to hear their voices, " she said. "I hope you're safe.
sentences.chinese: “我想听到他们的声音”，她说，“我希望你们平安。

sentences.english: Soft but safe Yin Shi Zu, never mind to break up with him.
sentences.chinese: 石柔只求尹祖平安无恙，绝不介意与他分手。

sentences.english: Respectfully requests, and praying fathers come to enjoy the family size peace, prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 恭请祖宗降临享用，并祈保合家大小平安，兴旺发达。

sentences.english: How do we receive and keep the peace in Christ?
sentences.chinese: 如何领受并持守在基督里的平安？

sentences.english: I wish all of my family will have health and safety.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我所有的家人都健康又平安。

sentences.english: There is some difference between W. P. A. and F. P. A.
sentences.chinese: “水渍险”与“平安险”是有些不同。

sentences.english: We’ll only relax when we know you’re all safe.
sentences.chinese: 我们只有知道你们都平安才会轻松下来。

sentences.english: I'll have the goods covered against Free from Particular Average.
sentences.chinese: 我将为货物投保平安险。

sentences.english: Good tiding for Christmas and a happy new year!
sentences.chinese: 祂祝福你新年常常平安愉快。

definition: to have a pleasant journey/Bon voyage!
lit. peace when you come or go/peace wherever you go
Anle district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan
May you have peace year after year (New Year's greeting)
to pray/to pray for sth/to wish sth/prayer/wish
